name: dim_customers
description: This model is a collected list of all of our paying dbt Cloud customers and their associated entity identifiers. We define a customer as someone who has paid us to use dbt Cloud. For on-prem customers, they will not have an associated account_id because we do not have access to that data (yet).

measures.name: customers_churned
measures.expr: CASE WHEN customer_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

measures.name: customers_new
measures.expr: CASE WHEN customer_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
